titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the excise tax on heavy truck tires.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code revise the excise tax on tires to impose on truck tires of the type used on highway vehicles, if wholly or in part made of rubber, sold by the manufacturer, producer, or importer a tax equal to 8 cents for each 10 pounds of the tire load capacity in excess of 3500 pounds.
